1: !dank     ~Gives you a random hot top 30 submission from r/dankmemes
!hentai       ~Gives you a random hot top 30 submission from r/hentai
!uwuify text  ~Type after the uwu to convert the text
!hello        ~Say hello to me and I say it back!
!redcomment username ~Retrieve a random reddit comment from inputted username
!r34s name    ~Search on /r/rule34 for a character's name, gives random result out of 25 posts
!8ball msg    ~Have a yes or no question you've been dying to ask? Request my insight on it!
!randnumb x y ~x and y are optional, randnumb by itself will give you a number from 0-100, just putting x will give you 0-x and putting y will give x-y
!lolmatch summonername ~Get some info from the latest match of the summoner of your choosing! Only for NA
!lolavg summonername   ~Get some info on the most recent 10 matches the summoner has had on SR! Only for NA
!enhance attachedimage factor ~Type !enhance and attach an image to get an increased contrast version of it, enhance factor optional!
!greyscale attachedimage ~Type !greyscale and attach an image to get the image in greyscale
!sharpen attachedimage factor ~Type !sharpen and attach an image to get an increased sharpened version of it, sharpen factor optional!
!help 2 ~Shows more commands in second help menu
2: !mememaker template textformat ~Available memes for templates are Tom and Jerry and Expanding Brain, they can be signified by
tj and eb respectively where the template belongs. The text format follows a unique pattern depending on the template.
textformat for tj will look like jerrytext:tomtext and for eb it will be text1:text2:text3:text4. The colons act as separators.
